name: Effective Bill Date
title: EBD
definition: Identifies the date billing is to cease for disconnect activity whenever the billing date is different from the due date.

validEntry.description: Two Digit Month (01-12) Two Digit Century (00-99)
Two Digit Day (01-31) Two Digit Year (00-99)
Two Digit Century (00-99) Two Digit Month (01-12)
Two Digit Year (00-99) Two Digit Day (01-31)

usageNotes: Required when the RT field is “F”, the ACT field on the ASR Form is “D”, and the EBD field is different than the DD field.
Prohibited when the RT field is “B” or “S”.
